entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a Quidditch player who is talking to Harry about the importance of winning today.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a Seeker in the Quidditch team and has to show that he can win without relying on his father's wealth.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is another player who Harry needs to beat to win today.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a Quidditch player who teases Harry about the pressure of winning.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is the Quidditch teacher who starts the game by blowing her whistle.

relationships.description: Harry needs to beat Malfoy to win today.
Wood is encouraging Harry to show that he can win without relying on his father's wealth.
